questions.question: Mom watched with deep emotion as her son received his diploma. What parental reward is this?
One disadvantage of adopting is the short transition period. Which statement means the same?

choices.answer: Children have problems from the previous family
The parents support each other and are mutual partners
The parents do not have 9 months to prepare for parenthood
The parents try and give their child everything

questions.question: Jon was fired. His marriage is rocky. He yells at his kids. According to Maslow, the problem is

choices.answer: The child is affected by how well the child's needs are met
Child's needs must be partially met before the next level
Parenting is affected by how well parents' need are met
Women have more needs than men

questions.question: An advantage of being a single parent is having one rule maker. Which statement means the same?

choices.answer: The single parent can go to their family members for help
The single parent needs a spouse to help make decisions
The single parent can make decisions without asking anyone

questions.question: Marissa and Clint love to travel and decided not to have a child. Why did they decide this?

choices.answer: They are afraid to have an unhealthy baby
They do not want to be tied down
They have careers to focus on at this time

questions.question: Parents want to see the world through a child's eyes. What is their reason for having a child.

choices.answer: A child will make them love each other more
Their parents want them to have children
They want a little boy because girls don't like nature

questions.question: Amy wants a baby. She has patience, self-control, and can problem solve. This is an example of
Teaching children to be honest is an example of what?
What kind of parenthood challenge would come from fear of a having a child with a birth defect?
Rex took his grandchild to the fair and watched her carefully. What responsibility is this?
When Corbin gets home from work he makes sure to lock the doors. What responsibility is this?
Caitlin has diabetes and has decided against having a child. This is an example of
Josie fell on the pavement and her parents showed concern for her. What responsibility is this?
According to Maslow, having good character is an example of what type of need?
Anna and Thomas have been saving for years and live on a budget. This is an example of what?
Brooke needs a car and Michael needs new boots. This illustrates which implication of Maslow?

choices.answer: Development of a person is affected by how needs are met
Every individual in a family has needs
Men have more needs than women
One level of needs must be met before meeting the next level

questions.question: Jordan works weekend but he worries that it will be hard with a baby. What challenge is this?
In college you have a dorm room and a meal card. This is an example of Maslow's level...
Ameris loves going to football games. Now she's a mom and she can't go. What challenge is this?
